result.name: Political Science/International Relations B.A.
result.templateAssets:
[{"type":"GeneralText","content":"

DATED MATERIAL, SUBJECT TO CHANGE. PLEASE CONSULT CURRENT UCSD GENERAL CATALOG FOR ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.


Please visit the Department of Political Science homepage: http://polisci.ucsd.edu.


NOTE: Eight areas of concentration are offered.


Students are required to take two of the lower-division introductory courses (10-11-13) as well as Political Science 12 and Political Science 30 (PS 30 is not included in the introductory sequence).
